title: Chino Valley Ranchers Unveils New Website Highlighting Family-Inspired Values & Heritage
author: Chino Valley Ranchers
content:
[COLTON, CA - Sept. 23, 2021] Chino Valley Ranchers announces the launch of its redesigned website featuring advanced graphic animation, in-depth history of the company’s multi-generation family ownership, and the latest products embodying the deeply-embedded values shaping the company’s past, present, and future.


A months-long design and development process has concluded with the launch of an interactive and easy-to-navigate website featuring recipe videos, interesting facts about raising chickens, and the latest news from Chino Valley Ranchers.


Speaking about the website launch, Chino Valley Ranchers Senior Vice President Chris Nichols said, “We’re excited to launch this new iteration of our website and showcase the authenticity of our brand, our commitment to quality products and innovation, our Chino Valley Ranchers family, and the playful nature of who we are and what we do.”


Website visitors can read a detailed history of the family business that started over 50 years ago and learn how a small egg business grew into a leading rancher with a reputation built on quality and innovation. From feed to field, Chino Valley Ranchers chickens receive the highest quality of treatment and care to ensure their comfort and happiness. 


As a Southern California-based business, Chino Valley Ranchers has led the way in the humane treatment of chickens within the local egg industry and continues to demonstrate its commitment to superior quality by releasing nutritious new products, such as pasture raised eggs.


To see the new website, visit: chinovalleyranchers.com

Nichols adds, “Be sure to visit our website in November 2021 for a surprise sure to rock our industry!”

 

About Chino Valley Ranchers: Founded over 50 years ago, Chino Valley Ranchers is a third-generation family-owned and operated producer of organic, free-range and cage free eggs and egg products. Along with a network of family owned independent farms throughout the country, Chino Valley Ranchers is proud to provide specialty eggs to their customers across the US.
